• All lines: Lines that should be in all result files

how DOCSTRIP can be combined with Sweave to imple-
ment the compendium concept. The starting point is

estimation and presenting the result. The purpose is
to construct a single compendium source file which
contains the code used to create (i) an “article” PDF–

a more detailed description of loading and prepro-
cessing data and the estimation. The source file also
